DOC.brief_summary: The aim prospective randomize control clinical trial compare esthetic , clinical patient-centered outcome follow immediate early implant placement protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Esthetic , Clinical Radiographic Outcomes Immediate Early Implant Placement
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize two group : immediate early implant placement . The investigator ask subject take part research study soft tissue bone heal around dental implant follow tooth extraction . The investigator want compare gum bone change shape heal two different scenario .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old able understand inform consent Adequate oral hygiene allow implant therapy consistent standard care . Missing single tooth maxillary anterior region Presence adjacent natural teeth Poor oral hygiene Severe parafunctional habit , example , bruxing clench Presence clinically active periodontal disease express probe pocket depthsâ‰¥4 mm combination bleed probe . Conditions might lead possibly lowered regenerative capacity bone , example , osteoporosis Paget 's disease Pregnant expect pregnant History drug alcohol abuse History systemic disease would contraindicate oral surgical treatment , example , uncontrolled diabetes ( define HBA1c level > 7 % ) Radiotherapy head neck area , On certain medication like bisphosphonates steroid currently within past three month Absence adjacent teeth Unwillingness return followup examination Smokers ( 20 cigarette per day ) . Subjects smoke < 20 cigarette per day request stop smoking surgery
